rawText:
Swati Roy 
Aspiring Product Designer with a tech background and a passion for human-centered design. 
swati98.roy@gmail.com | +91 9831437532 | Bengaluru, India | LinkedIn | Behance 
 
Experience 
UI/UX Designer 
Blurgs Innovations Pvt Ltd, Bengaluru — Apr 2024–Jun2025 
• Led branding, website, and platform UI design for Dhoop, a solar panel maintenance SaaS. 
• Redesigned company website with a minimal layout and integrated Lottie animations for better storytelling. 
• Conducted product research for a Vessel Tracking & Monitoring System (VTMS) platform.  
• Designed internal tools including a data annotation platform and an Agentic AI chatbot interface. 
• Created illustrations and product mockups for pitch decks. 
UI/UX Design Intern 
BrainQuest Consultancy & Training, Remote — Oct 2023–Dec 2023 
• Collaborated with clients worldwide to design their websites using Wix. 
Cloud Infrastructure Specialist 
IBM India Pvt Ltd, Kolkata — Sep 2021–Jul 2023 
• Provided post-migration support to application infrastructure in AWS Cloud, as a part of the SRE team. 
 
Skills 
• Design Tools & Skills: Figma, Wireframing, Prototyping, UX Research, UI Design, Design Systems, Color 
Theory, Information Architecture, Wix, Lottielab, Canva, WordPress 
• Devops Tools: AWS (EC2, RDS, IAM, CloudWatch), Jenkins, Terraform, BitBucket, Jira 
• Languages & Frontend: HTML, CSS, Basics of ReactJS 
 
Education 
B.Tech in Computer Science & Engineering 
St. Thomas’ College of Engineering & Technology (MAKAUT), Kolkata — Jul 2017–Jul 2021 
DGPA: 8.69
 
Certifications ↗ 
• UI/UX Design Bootcamp — Designboat UI/UX School, Mar 2023 
• Enterprise Design Thinking Practitioner — IBM, Dec 2022 
• Foundations of UX Design — Google (Coursera), Oct 2022 
• Azure Fundamentals (AZ-900) — Microsoft, Mar 2022 
• ReactJS Course — Alien Brains, Apr 2019
